com.streamspin.client
Class UserInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.streamspin.client.UserInfo

public class UserInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Contains all the information needed by the client at startup-/login-time.

Author:
jenslyn

Constructor Detail

UserInfo

public UserInfo(int uid,
                java.util.ArrayList<Location> locations,
                java.lang.Boolean gpsDefault,
                int gpsThreshold,
                java.util.ArrayList<StartService> sService,
                java.util.ArrayList<Profile> profiles,
                java.util.ArrayList<ServiceProfile> serviceProfiles)
UserInfo constructor

Parameters:
uid - User id.
locations - List of preset locations.
gpsDefault - If user wants to use GPS as default.
gpsThreshold - The threshold for which the client should send its GPS position.
sService - List of services which needs to be started manually.
profiles - List of user interest profiles.
serviceProfiles - List of services which can contain scripts.
